text: Comic Relief is a charity with a vision
of a just world free from poverty we've
been around for around 35 years we've
raised over 1.2 billion pounds and we
fund projects which tackle four core
issues so a place to be so that sort of
refugees and homelessness childhood
early development gender justice and
also mental health so I'm the product
lead within the digital and innovation
team we're responsible for all of the
consumer facing products we have a
requirement to have huge scaling for a 7
hour TV show and for the rest of the
year our scaling requirements are really
quite low previously this was carried
out with a group of around 30 people
across multiple different suppliers
bringing in physical servers onto our
premises to carry out this hosting
challenge moving into a platform where
we can sort of rent the servers that we
need rather than having to always host
and pay for the maintenance ourselves
made a lot of sense we've been working
the cloud now for over seven years
using AWS and through a third-party
supplier we went multi filed at that
point to make sure that we had the
resilience that we needed for our
platforms being multi cloud was
beneficial in some ways but it was a
meant that there was a lot of
duplication of work required in order to
host platforms across multiple clouds
moving away from physical servers made a
lot of sense for us because we have a
seven hour TV show in which we get the
majority of our traffic and donations
having to host and set up and maintain
servers ourselves just didn't make
logical sense so we've moved into the
proud we're now actually adopting
service so that all of our engineers are
able to care more about their code
rather than maintaining servers most
interesting products which we currently
run on AWS is our service donation
platform which has to have the
availability to take up to 350 donations
per second whereas we have a third party
supplier for SMS but we need to be able
to capture SMS gift aid for people
texting in to donate they will all be
sent a link back to add Gift Aid onto
their donation and so we can have
thousands of people open that link at
the exact same second we're pretty
impressed with the speed at which
service can enable you to get products
out there in the hands of users and you
can always scale it when you need to
being able to have the majority of our
team focusing on our bespoke needs
making use of commodity tech for example
using AWS for things like queuing and
storage it means that we can focus on
what's bespoke to comic relief needs
boil it all down to what the biggest
winners then it would be that we've made
a 93% saving in costs for hosting our
services the more money that we save in
things like hosting the more money that
we can fund in our projects so it's been
a really big win for us and our digital
transformation
